name: Bog
description: A peat bog preserves ancient remains and artifacts in its acidic waters, making it valuable for archaeologists. However, the unstable ground can swallow travelers whole, and the methane gas can create deadly explosions.
atmosphere: Bubbles of methane gas rise with soft popping sounds. Air carries rich, earthy peat scent and metallic acidic water tang. Ground feels spongy and uncertain underfoot. Acidic waters preserve ancient secrets. Mist hangs over creating otherworldly atmosphere. Deceptive landscape hides deadly secrets beneath surface.
